statements: SELECT * FROM health_assessment WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, assessment_date FROM health_assessment WHERE depression_score > 10;
SELECT * FROM health_assessment WHERE anxiety_score < 5 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, depression_score, anxiety_score FROM health_assessment ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, depression_score, anxiety_score FROM health_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, assessment_date, depression_score, anxiety_score FROM health_assessment WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, depression_score, anxiety_score, assessment_date FROM health_assessment WHERE anxiety_score > 50 AND depression_score < 30;
SELECT user_id, anxiety_score, depression_score FROM health_assessment ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, assessment_date, depression_score, anxiety_score FROM health_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT user_id, AVG(depression_score) AS avg_depression_score, AVG(anxiety_score) AS avg_anxiety_score FROM health_assessment GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(depression_score) > 40;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND risk_level = 'High';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(assessment_id) AS num_assessments FROM risk_assessment GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(assessment_id) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE age >= 25 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE risk_level = 'High';
SELECT user_id, intervention_type, intervention_date FROM interventions ORDER BY intervention_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT u.username, a.assessment_date, a.assessment_score FROM users u INNER JOIN assessments a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY a.assessment_date ASC;

SELECT u.username, i.intervention_type, i.outcome FROM users u INNER JOIN interventions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.outcome LIKE '%successful%' AND i.intervention_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT u.username, a.assessment_date, i.intervention_type FROM users u INNER JOIN assessments a ON u.user_id = a.user_id INNER JOIN interventions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE a.assessment_score > 60 AND i.intervention_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT u.username, u.age, a.assessment_date, i.intervention_type, i.outcome FROM users u LEFT JOIN assessments a ON u.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN interventions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patient WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM Patient WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, risk_score FROM Patient INNER JOIN RiskAssessment ON Patient.patient_id = RiskAssessment.patient_id WHERE risk_score > 70;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, phone_number, address FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, phone_number, address FROM Patient WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan, provider_name FROM MedicalHistory WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, patient_id, risk_factors, risk_score, assessment_date FROM RiskAssessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, phone_number FROM Patient WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM therapists WHERE specialization = 'Cognitive Behavioral Therapy';
SELECT therapist_id, name FROM therapists WHERE name LIKE '%David%';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT therapist_id, name, specialization FROM therapists WHERE specialization = 'Cognitive Behavioral Therapy' ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM appointments JOIN therapists ON appointments.therapist_id = therapists.therapist_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date;
SELECT patient_id, assessment_date, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 0.7 ORDER BY risk_score DESC, assessment_date;
SELECT patient_id, intervention_type, effectiveness FROM interventions WHERE intervention_type = 'Mindfulness' ORDER BY patient_id, intervention_type DESC;
